channel.title: Telegram Notification :: ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: Telegram is free service Considering you have Telegram account and you already installed Telegram on you phone/PC: You need a bot token and a chat/channel id: 1 - Create a bot with BotFather Open telegram application and open chat with Botfather. Type or select /newbot Type the name of the bot (2) and its username (3) Doing this you will get your bot token (4) that you need for T1=<bot token> You can have notifications directly from your bot by finding the numeric chatid.
